thread.title: San Bernardino Sheriff’s Locate Mom Who Allegedly Abducted 2 Kids During Supervised Visit
thread.title_full: San Bernardino Sheriff’s Locate Mom Who Allegedly Abducted 2 Kids During Supervised Visit

author: CBS Los Angeles
title: San Bernardino Sheriff’s Locate Mom Who Allegedly Abducted 2 Kids During Supervised Visit
text:
San Bernardino Sheriff’s Locate Mom Who Allegedly Abducted 2 Kids During Supervised Visit February 11, 2017 4:57 PM Authorities are looking for Christabel Peralta, accused of abducting her two children. (credit: San Bernardino Sheriff's Dept.) 
RANCHO CUCAMONGA (CBSLA.com) — San Bernardino Sheriff’s on Saturday evening announced that a woman they said abducted her two children during a supervised visit has been located. 
San Bernardino Sheriff’s said that this morning, around 10:30, Christabel Peralta was at the Children’s and Family Services Office for a supervised visit with her two children. 
Officials said Peralta took the children to the restroom and did not return. 
No details were given as to how or where Peralta was located.
